perturbation.original_text: 16.2 Applicable Law. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [***], without regard to the conflicts of law principles thereof, and [***].
perturbation.changed_text: 16.2 Applicable Law. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [***], without regard to the conflicts of law principles thereof, and the process of law will be determined by an arbitrator.
perturbation.explanation: In this case, the applicable law is being removed for a reference to an arbitrator. This is problematic because choice of law is a fundamental aspect of contract enforcement and must be agreed upon at the time of signing, in order to be valid.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Basic Principles of US Contract Law.

perturbation.original_text: 15.4 Non-Solicitation. Each Party agrees that, during the [***] ([***]) [***] period starting from the Effective Date, such Party will not, directly or indirectly, solicit for employment any employee of the other Party or its Affiliates or otherwise induce or attempt to induce such employees to terminate their employment with such other Party or such other Party's Affiliates; provided, however, that general public solicitations and advertisements not directed at employees of the other Party, and the extension of offers to persons who respond to such general solicitations and advertisements, will not be deemed violations of this provision. Upon breach of this non-solicitation obligation set forth in this Section 15.4, [***].
perturbation.changed_text: 11.4 Material. Each Party agrees that, during the [***] ([***]) [***] period starting from the Effective Date, such Party will not, directly or indirectly, solicit for employment any employee of the other Party or its Affiliates or otherwise induce or attempt to induce such employees to terminate their employment with such other Party or such other Party's Affiliates; provided, however, that general public solicitations and advertisements not directed at employees of the other Party, and the extension of offers to persons who respond to such general solicitations and advertisements, will not be deemed violations of this provision. Upon breach of this non-solicitation obligation set forth in this Section 15.4, [***].
perturbation.explanation: Relocating the non-solicitation clause to 'Material' is structurally misleading. Non-solicitation clauses are generally categorized under Employment Terms or Termination sections. Placing it under 'Material,' which concerns the use of biological or chemical materials, obscures the true intention of the clause and reduces its discoverability and enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Basic Principles of US Contract Law.

perturbation.original_text: 7.4 Late Payments. To the extent Licensee fails to make full payment to Bioeq hereunder on the due date for payment, without prejudice to any other right or remedy available to Bioeq, Bioeq shall be entitled to charge Licensee interest on such payments at a rate per annum equal to [***] ([***]) percentage points above the then-applicable 3-month EURIBOR rate (regardless of whether such rate is positive, negative, or zero), published at https://www.euribor-rates.eu/.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.74 Interpretation. To the extent Licensee fails to make full payment to Bioeq hereunder on the due date for payment, without prejudice to any other right or remedy available to Bioeq, Bioeq shall be entitled to charge Licensee interest on such payments at a rate per annum equal to [***] ([***]) percentage points above the then-applicable 3-month EURIBOR rate (regardless of whether such rate is positive, negative, or zero), published at https://www.euribor-rates.eu/.
perturbation.explanation: Relocating the 'Late Payments' clause to the 'Interpretation' section is structurally misleading. Clauses about payment are supposed to be with the financial clauses of a contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Basic Principles of US Contract Law.
